wikipedia_page.main: Major Hugh James Wyld T.D. (16 April 1880 – 9 December 1961) was an English cricketer.  Wyld was a right-handed batsman who bowled slow left-arm orthodox.  He was born in Kensington, London and educated at Harrow School and Magdalen College, Oxford, while later in his life he became an officer in the  British Army.

response: *Major Hugh Wyld (1880–1961), British Army officer and cricketer
